LEGAL NOTICE The Board of Education for North Tonawanda City School District herby invites the submission of sealed bids for Printing Services for the 2025-2026 school year. Envelopes containing the bids must be sealed and clearly labeled as â€œNorth Tonawanda 25-26 Printing Servicesâ€. Bids are due in the District Office no later than 2:00 PM on June 26, 2025 at which time they will be publicly opened and read in the boardroom at this location. The Administration Building is located at: 176 Walck Road North Tonawanda, New York, 14120 Bid specifications and the bid forms may be obtained at the same office between the hours of 8:00 AM to 3:30 PM Monday through Friday or on the district webpage at www.ntschools.org. The Board of Education reserves the right to waive any informalities in, or to reject any bid, or all bids. All bids submitted will be binding for ninety (90) days subsequent to the date of opening.
